scripts.accessibility:keyboard: echo 'âŒ¨ï¸ Keyboard Navigation Check' && grep -r 'keyboard\|keydown\|keyup' src/ platforms/ || echo 'No keyboard navigation found'
scripts.accessibility:wcag: echo 'â™¿ WCAG 2.2 AA Testing' && grep -r 'accessibility\|wcag\|aria-' src/ platforms/ || echo 'No accessibility implementations found'
scripts.audit:compliance: pnpm run compliance:full && pnpm run compliance:report
scripts.prebuild: pnpm run clean && pnpm run lint && pnpm run typecheck
scripts.build:analyze: pnpm run build:prod && pnpm run analyze:bundle
scripts.compliance:full: pnpm run nsm:security-scan && pnpm run gdpr:audit && pnpm run digdir:standards-check && pnpm run accessibility:wcag && pnpm run i18n:validate
scripts.compliance:quick: pnpm run nsm:classification-check && pnpm run gdpr:validate && pnpm run digdir:api-validation
scripts.compliance:report: echo 'ðŸ“Š Generating Norwegian Compliance Report' && node dist/tools/cli/index.js analyze --compliance --output=compliance-report.json
scripts.digdir:api-validation: echo 'ðŸ“¡ DigDir API Validation' && grep -r 'openapi\|swagger\|api' src/ platforms/ || echo 'No API documentation found'
scripts.digdir:interoperability: echo 'ðŸ”— DigDir Interoperability' && grep -r 'digdir\|DigDir\|interoperability' src/ platforms/ || echo 'No DigDir implementations found'
scripts.digdir:standards-check: echo 'ðŸ›ï¸ DigDir Standards Check' && node dist/tools/cli/index.js validate --digdir
scripts.gdpr:audit: echo 'ðŸ›¡ï¸ GDPR Compliance Audit' && node dist/tools/cli/index.js compliance --gdpr --strict
scripts.gdpr:consent-check: echo 'âœ… GDPR Consent Check' && grep -r 'consent\|ConsentManagement' src/ platforms/ || echo 'No consent management found'
scripts.gdpr:validate: echo 'ðŸ“‹ GDPR Validation' && grep -r 'gdpr\|GDPR\|dataProtection\|retention' src/ platforms/ || echo 'No GDPR implementations found'
scripts.i18n:norwegian: echo 'ðŸ‡³ðŸ‡´ Norwegian Text Check' && grep -r 'norwegian\|norsk\|bokmÃ¥l\|nynorsk' src/ platforms/ || echo 'No Norwegian text references found'
scripts.i18n:validate: echo 'ðŸ‡³ðŸ‡´ Norwegian Language Validation' && find . -name '*.json' -path '*/locales/*' -o -path '*/i18n/*' | grep -E '(nb|nn)' || echo 'No Norwegian locale files found'
scripts.nsm:classification-check: echo 'ðŸ›ï¸ NSM Classification Check' && grep -r 'NSM_CLASSIFICATION\|nsmClassification' src/ platforms/ || echo 'No NSM classifications found'
scripts.nsm:security-scan: echo 'ðŸ”’ NSM Security Scan' && node dist/tools/cli/index.js audit --nsm --classification={{NSM_CLASSIFICATION}}
scripts.prepack: pnpm run build:prod && pnpm run validate:build
scripts.test:matrix: pnpm run test:unit && pnpm run test:integration && pnpm run test:platforms && pnpm run test:compliance && pnpm run test:performance
scripts.typecheck:all: pnpm run typecheck && pnpm run typecheck:examples
scripts.version: conventional-changelog -p angular -i CHANGELOG.md -s && git add CHANGELOG.md
scripts.workflow:validate: pnpm run lint:fix && pnpm run format:check && pnpm run typecheck && pnpm run compliance:quick

hooks.pre-commit: pnpm run lint && pnpm run typecheck
